ISSUE.TITLE: Category canonical URL should sort specification attribute IDs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When I run an seo spider against the store, I get messages relating to multiple canonical formats. This happens when filters are used. Example below. Is there anything I can do to prevent this? In this case there are only two filters but what if I had ten or more? https://store.domain.com/category?specs=102,103 which can also be accessed by https://store.domain.com/category?specs=103,102 Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/47254/multple-canonical-formats.aspx
